derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from Irish bean sídhe, from Old Irish ben síde 'woman of the fairies'

entry.tran: （爱尔兰民间传说中通过哀嚎警告家中将有人死亡的）报丧女妖
entry.def: In Irish folk stories, a banshee is a female spirit who warns you by her long, sad cry that someone in your family is going to die.

means.word_mean: 1. (Irish folklore) a female spirit who wails to warn of impending death
